text:
The heart of the [[Lycaeum]] district of [[Metrol]], the Vermishard
of Lore held the Royal Library of [[Galifar]], which held both literature and historical
records dating back a thousand years. Its
spiraling corridors contained volumes of poetry,
arcane treatises, and much more—including the
original manuscript of [[Karrn the Conqueror]]’s
famed [[Analects of War]]. Atop the spire lies the
''Vermishard Academy'', where the nobles of [[Galifar]]
studied magic; while not as versatile as [[Arcanix]],
the Academy was considered the finest place to
learn the arts of [[enchantment]]. The current status of the Vermishard of Lore
is unknown.
title: Vermishard of Lore
tags: university museum Metrol ruin Vermishards library Lycaeum
